wikipedia_page.main: Frank Bernard Brett  (born 10 March 1899 – 21 July 1988) was an English footballer who played as a full back.

response: He remained in Sussex, playing County League football for Vernon Athletic, and went into the bookmaking business with Frank Brett, a former teammate. Wilson died in Hove in 1955 at the age of 56.
